CustomField.description: Used to determine if the user is 'Lightning' or not. This will be valuable in validation rules, reporting, workflow rules, and anything else that requires special treatment between lightning and classic users.
CustomField.formula:
AND( OR( CONTAINS(Profile.Name, "Lightning"),
ProfileId = "00e70000000swa5", ProfileId = "00e70000000j606", ProfileId = "00e70000000swa8", ProfileId = "00e39000001SAoz", ProfileId = "00ef2000001nr3T", ProfileId = "00e70000000zpJJ" ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TRUE = This user is a lightning user and subject to many lightning validation rules that other users are not.
CustomField.label: Lightning User
